participant_1.background:
I pack my bags for the trip ahead of me.
I trust God to help me stay healthy, even when I am too busy to take care of myself.
I am always excited for Christmas with my family.
i like to plant flowers in my gardens.
i like to make cookies.

participant_2.background:
I'm going to a local Christmas concert with my friend, even though I can't sing very well.
My collection of rocks and minerals calms me down.
i m allergic to apples yet still eat them.
I like to wake up to the smell of fresh-brewed coffee.
I am a security guard who enjoys driving my Ford truck to work.

content.text: I'm doing well, thanks! I'm excited for Christmas. What about you?
Christmas is my favorite holiday! I'm getting ready for my trip to visit my family.
That sounds exciting! I'm going to a local Christmas concert with my friend.
Oh fun! I'm not sure if I'll be able to make it to any concerts this year.
I hope you can! They're always so much fun.
What are you looking forward to most about Christmas?
I'm excited to see my family and spend time with them. I'm also looking forward to eating all the delicious food!
That sounds great! I'm always excited for the food too.
Me too! I love making cookies and giving them to my family and friends.
That's so nice of you! I love to receive cookies at Christmas.
